title: Prometheus & Grafana Monitoring Stack
summary: Production-grade monitoring stack with Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager. Includes custom dashboards and alerting for cloud infrastructure.

content.description:
# Prometheus & Grafana Monitoring Stack

A comprehensive monitoring solution for cloud infrastructure with real-time metrics and alerting.

## Features

- Prometheus metrics collection and storage
- Custom Grafana dashboards
- AlertManager configuration
- Service discovery integration
- High availability setup

## Technical Details

- Prometheus 2.x deployment
- Grafana dashboard templates
- Alert rule management
- PromQL query optimization
- Metrics retention policies

## Implementation

The stack uses Prometheus for metrics collection and storage, with Grafana providing visualization and AlertManager handling notifications. Includes service discovery for automatic target configuration.
